sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container class="fill-height" fluid>
    <v-row justify="center" align="center">
      <v-col cols="12" sm="8" md="4">
        <v-card>
          <v-card-title class="text-h5">Login</v-card-title>
          <v-card-text>
            <v-form @submit.prevent="submitLogin" ref="loginForm" v-model="valid">
              <v-text-field
                v-model="username"
                label="Username"
                :rules="[v => !!v || 'Username is required']"
                required
              />
              <v-text-field
                v-model="password"
                label="Password"
                type="password"
                :rules="[v => !!v || 'Password is required']"
                required
              />
              <v-btn
                type="submit"
                color="primary"
                :disabled="!valid || loading"
                class="mt-4"
                block
              >
                Login
              </v-btn>
            </v-form>
          </v-card-text>
          <v-card-actions>
            <v-alert v-if="errorMessage" type="error" dense text>
              {{ errorMessage }}
            </v-alert>
          </v-card-actions>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref } from 'vue'
import axios from 'axios'

const username = ref('')
const password = ref('')
const valid = ref(false)
const errorMessage = ref('')
const loading = ref(false)

const submitLogin = async () => {
  errorMessage.value = ''
  if (!valid.value) return

  loading.value = true
  try {
    const response = await axios.post('http://localhost:8000/login', {
      username: username.value,
      password: password.value,
    })

    console.log('Login success:', response.data)
    // เก็บ token หรือทำอย่างอื่นตามต้องการ เช่น redirect ไปหน้าอื่น
  } catch (error) {
    errorMessage.value = error.response?.data?.detail || 'Login failed'
  } finally {
    loading.value = false
  }
}
</script>
